Task Performed: Creating a history and building a list collection for the datasets by importing those datasets in history
Quality Control: using NanoPlot tool to explore the datasets
De-novo Assembly: Pairwise alignment using Map with minimap2 tool
Ultrafast de novo assembly: using Miniasm tool
Remapping: First convert the Assembly Graph (collection) created previously by Miniasm using GFA to Fasta tool then perform pairwise sequence alignment again using Map with minimap2 tool
Ultrafast consensus module using Racon tool
Visualize the assemblies using Bandage image tool
Optimizing assemblies using Create assemblies with Unicycler tool and again visualize using Bandage image tool
Prediction of plasmid sequences and classes using PlasFlow tool
Scanning of genome contigs for antimicrobial resistance genes using staramr tool.
Extract more information using CARD database
